text: wadhkur -ayha alrswl- talab 'iibrahim min rabih 'ana yryh kayfiat albeth, faqal allah lh: 'awalm twmn? qal: bla, wlkn 'atlub dhlk lazdad yqynana ealaa yqyny, qal: fakhudh 'arbaeatan min altayr fadmmhn 'iilayk wadhbhhn wqtehn, thuma ajeal ealaa kuli jabal minhuna jz'ana, thuma nadihn yatinak msreat. fnada 'iibrahim ealayh alslam, fa'iidha kl juz' yaeud 'iilaa mwdeh, wa'iidha biha tati msre. waelam 'ana allah eaziz la yghlbh shy', hakim fi aqwalh wafealh wshreh wqdrh
